scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:lowmem: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend:lowmem" "npm run dev:frontend:lowmem"
scripts.dev:backend:lowmem: cd backend && ./py-env/bin/uvicorn app.main:app --reload --reload-dir app --reload-exclude py-env --reload-exclude data --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:frontend:lowmem: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=1536 NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 npm --prefix frontend run dev:lowmem
